features: 🎄【Compatible models】 This replacement part is suitable for Shark Lift-away Pro&Genius Steam Mops S3973, S3973D, S3973WM; Shark Genius Steam Pocket Mop System S5001, S5002Q, S5003A, S5003D, S5004, S5004W, S6001W, S6001WM, S6002, S6002C, S6003D, S6003W. For Shark model P184WQ&XTP184 touch-free dirt grip washable pads. Fit for both the Genius mop head and the Intelli-Mop head. Please confirm the model before purchasing, for anything you can consult us.
🎄【Discounted 8-Pack】 You will get 8 pack of shark steam mop pads use less money, and get the same cleaning results.

🎄【Home cleaning helper】 The mop pad is made of 80% polyester fiber and 20% polyamide fiber, thus the material has good water absorption. Besides, regularly change the mop can help your steam perform better and remove stains effectively.

🎄【Washable&reusable】 When your mop pad is dirty, you can simply rinse it with water, dry it and use it again. You can directly choose to machine wash, of course, you can also simply wash by hand to clean, very convenient.
🎄【100% satisfaction】 Tivcroxs are committed to providing our customers with high-quality products and services. Please contact us in time for any product questions and suggestions. Have fun shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received a steam machine I have never seen pads like this I love them you can physically use both sides while steaming your floors and carpets. I love the fact their machine washable so I'm not spending a lot of money to keep buying pads. 👍🤗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price for the quantity. Work as good as any I've used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay direct replacement for shark mop
reviews.reviewText: It's not bad. Love that it's a multi pack. It's not great. Much thinner than OEM but will do the job. Would've preferred thicker. Material is also a bit tougher but then I guess it'll be great for stubborn stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Affordable, Not Perfect, But Great for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like that these Shark Replacements Pads are so affordable. Before, I would soak them for hours in Oxi Clean to make them last longer. If one gets too dirty or I wear one out, it's okay to grab a new one. They are not as good as the originals. They don't fit tightly, and the cuff needs to be stronger. But I am completely fine with that. I'm not looking to make them last for years. At this price, I don't mind using them and tossing them once they're too dirty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits good for shark genius
reviews.reviewText: Great value, you get 8 of these pads. I have a shark genius and it fits with small adjustments. The original pads come right on without any hand helping but this one seems a little more snug at the attach points in one spot, but nothing you can't fix without just slipping it on with your hand. That's not a deal breaker for me.The quality seems to be similar to the original and functionality is all the same so no issues there.Overall 5 stars for quality and 4 for exact fit.
